Document.name: ReferenceCounterOperator
Document.summary: The strategy class to create and delete the reference counter of an object. For any object inherits from , the reference counter is stored inside the object. For any other object, the reference counter is allocated separately. You can create your own strategy by adding a new partial specialization to this class.
Document.typeparam: will always use as the second type parameter. This parameter is useful when you want to do partial specialization in the SFINAE way.
Document.signature: template < typename T, typename Enabled /* optional */ > struct ReferenceCounterOperator;
